fireball.name: fireball
fireball.description: Hurls a ball of fire towards a targeted enemy dealing damage instantly and over time
combatHitStrings: ${nameSelf} hurls a ball of fire towards ${nameEnemy} dealing ${damageDealt} damage!
combatCriticalStrings: ${nameSelf} hurls a massive ball of fire to critically hit ${nameEnemy} for ${damageDealt} damage completely frying it in the process!
combatMissStrings: ${nameSelf}'s fireball evaporates in the air missing ${nameEnemy}!

fireballDot.name: fireball DOT
combatHitStrings: ${nameSelf}'s fireball continues to burn ${nameEnemy} for ${damageDealt} damage!

arcaneblast.name: arcane blast
arcaneblast.description: Channels an arcane blast at the target location capable of dealing massive damage
combatHitStrings: ${nameSelf} conjures an arcane blast at ${nameEnemy}'s location dealing ${damageDealt} damage!
combatCriticalStrings: ${nameSelf} channels all power to create a devastating arcane blast dealing ${damageDealt} critical damage to ${nameEnemy}!
combatMissStrings: ${nameSelf}'s arcane blast misses ${nameEnemy} by an inch!

arcaneConcentration.name: arcane concentration
arcaneConcentration.description: Meditates to increase the power of all damaging attacks for the rest of the fight
combatHitStrings: ${nameSelf} meditates to increase its powers for the rest of the fight!

rainOfFire.name: rain of fire
rainOfFire.description: Summons a rain of fire upon all enemies
combatHitStrings: ${nameSelf} channels a rain of fire on the battlefield ${damagesString}!
